hero.title: Welcome to QWORKS
hero.subtitle: The gig platform designed for Québec, fully in French and compliant with Québec laws

features.title: Why Choose QWORKS?
features.localFirstDesc: Designed specifically for Quebecers, with French as the primary language
features.compliantDesc: Complies with Bill 96 (Charter of the French Language) and Law 25 (privacy protection)
features.secureDesc: Complete protection of your personal data with clear consent

compliance.title: Our Commitment to Québec
compliance.description: QWORKS is proud to fully comply with Québec's legal requirements:
compliance.bill96: Bill 96 (Charter of the French Language): Our website is available in French with equal or superior quality to any other language
compliance.law25: Law 25 (Privacy Protection): We obtain clear consent, publish our privacy policy, and have designated a data protection officer

consent.message: We use cookies to improve your experience. In accordance with Law 25, we need your consent.

overview.title: Overview
overview.content: QWORKS is committed to protecting your personal information in accordance with Law 25 (formerly Bill 64) on the protection of personal information in the private sector in Québec. This policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your data.

collection.title: Information We Collect
collection.intro: We collect the following information with your explicit consent:

items.name: First and last name
items.services: Information about services offered or requested

usage.title: Use of Your Information
usage.intro: We use your personal information only to:

items.matching: Facilitate matching between workers and clients

rights.title: Your Rights
rights.intro: In accordance with Law 25, you have the right to:

items.portability: Receive your data in a structured format
items.withdraw: Withdraw your consent at any time

security.title: Data Security
security.content: We implement appropriate technical and organizational security measures to protect your personal information against unauthorized access, modification, disclosure, or destruction.

contact.title: Data Protection Officer
contact.dpo: Our Data Protection Officer is available to answer all your questions:

law25.title: Law 25 Compliance
law25.content: This privacy policy complies with all requirements of Law 25 on the protection of personal information in the private sector. We are committed to maintaining transparency and protecting your privacy rights.
